stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes an important difference between the theories of revolution of Mao Zedong and those of Lenin?
choicesHtml: Lenin stressed the need for a powerful state structure.
Lenin thought that Marx’s writings were important.
Mao claimed that Marx’s early writings were less valid than Marx’s later ones.
Mao thought that communism was appropriate only for some nations and cultures.
Mao placed emphasis on the revolutionary potential of peasants.
